backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI text change in the declined state of App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, Tailwind config, and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app with title and meta description for the Valentine proposal.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component implementing the Valentine proposal flow with three states, themed UI, and interactive buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a DFINITY actor instance based on the user’s Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity provider and hook handling authentication, identity restoration, and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended Tailwind styles with romantic color palette, custom animations, typography, and component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, listing Valentine website requirements and features. Contains versioning info, existing features, and text-update instructions for the declined state UI.
